metadata.name: Suspicious SYSVOL Domain Group Policy Access
metadata.comment: Detects Access to Domain Group Policies stored in SYSVOL

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\sysvol\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\policies\\')))

output.summary: Detects Access to Domain Group Policies stored in SYSVOL

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrative activity References: https://adsecurity.org/?p=2288, https://www.hybrid-analysis.com/sample/f2943f5e45befa52fb12748ca7171d30096e1d4fc3c365561497c618341299d5?environmentId=100
